creator: Igor Chekachkov
caption: Elena (23 y.o.) is taking a shower after 6 days in the shelter in bombed Kharkiv and 30 hours train to Lviv. 10 years ago I started my “Daily Life” series, documenting how people share a common space. Today I continue to take photographs of people who was forced to leave their home because of russian invasion to Ukraine and now share the space with people who host them, as well as other displaced.
